website_summaries.verdict: Dedicated mirror solution that offers extra viewability around the user thanks to a trifold adjustable design. One of the best for an over-the-door mirror.
pros: Innovative folding mirror design provides three separate surfaces for a variety of different angles all at once
Provides some of the best coverage around
cons: Lack of built-in storage and organization can be a drawback

customer_reviews.title: Good design but fell apart on the first day.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is well designed but the materials are shoddy. One of the hinges tore free from the center panel the first time I tried to fold the mirror closed. The hinge screws tore themselves completely out of the center panel's frame, so that I cannot screw them back in. Back to Amazon it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jorjamore

customer_reviews.title: Looked good; however
customer_reviews.text: Item came promptly. A Christmas present for my Mother in Law! Looked good; however, one hinge was frozen closed and I didn't realize until I opened the left door. Hinge screws promptly pulled out of the wood frame. It took a lot of WD40 and muscle to loosed the hinge and My husband re-drilled the hinge fitting. The wood of the frame appears very soft; screws went in way to easy. Bottom line we repaired the mirror, it is working right now, but how disappointing to give a defective present to your MOTHER IN LAW. Mirror has made in USA sticker; this is not a good endorsement for American craftsmanship and quality control. And, no, I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like in a department store!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror. Great quality for the money. Bonus that it’s american made 🇺🇸 I was a bit leary when it said the mirror was of nonbreakable material, but the reflection is flawless. Handy that it has a mirror on the outside when closed. Great views from all angles when opened. Fairly easy to hang on the wall with the right tools (level, power drill/screwdriver, hammer). Will get Velcro strip to put on bottom back to keep mirror from moving when opening and closing. It comes with over the door hangers, but I did not use these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a client and helped her assemble/install. Assembly simply means screwing the enclosed door hangers to the back. You will need a medium size Phillips screwdriver but the holes are pre-drilled so it's super easy. If you wanted to attach to wall, there's even an enclosed template to ensure accurate placement as well as anchors if you need them. Everything was very well packaged. The client's been very satisfied with this product. After reading reviews, I was concerned about the quality, especially regarding the hinges coming off. That has not happen with this one. Wondering if quality varies among the various colors/finishes? We ordered the white one. It is very sturdy. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: beautiful mirror

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: The holes for attaching the hangers are not spaced properly, and we had to mickeymouse it to get it together. The magnet to keep the whole set closed isn't strong enough. The mirrors hang on the back of my bedroom door. Closing the door with any speed results in it coming off the door and then slamming back against it. I may move it to the less convenient but less used hall door. It's a great idea in concept but I wish I'd saved the money and just bought a single panel mirror.

customer_reviews.text: Came wrongly assembled, which I cannot un-do. Mine came with only three mirrors, not four.
